title: SK Falk
text:
Sportsklubben Falk is a <a href="Norway">Norwegian</a> sports club from <a href="Horten">Horten</a>, <a href="Vestfold">Vestfold</a>. It has sections for <a href="association%20football">association football</a> and <a href="handball">handball</a>.
It was founded in 1917 as a football club; the handball came in the 1940s. The club had an <a href="track%20and%20field">athletics</a> section from 1920 to 1924, when it broke out and formed the club "Horten FIK". Falk also had a <a href="bandy">bandy</a> section from 1945 to 1949, when it broke out and formed the club "Horten BK". In 1945 Falk absorbed the club "Horten SK".
The men's football team currently plays in the Fourth Division, the fifth tier of Norwegian football, after being relegated from the <a href="Norwegian%20Third%20Division">Third Division</a> in <a href="2010%20Norwegian%20Third%20Division">2010</a>. It last played in the <a href="Norwegian%20Second%20Division">Second Division</a> in <a href="1997%20Norwegian%20Second%20Division">1997</a>.
